panels.description: Bandwidth usage per wireless devices as reported by the UAPs. Rx is on the negative axis. Does not include amazon devices.
panels.title: switch0

targets.expr:
(sum(clamp_max(nomad_client_uptime{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance) + sum(clamp_max(nomad_nomad_autopilot_healthy{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance))
or
(sum(clamp_max(nomad_client_uptime{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance) unless sum(clamp_max(nomad_nomad_autopilot_healthy{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance))
or
(sum(clamp_max(nomad_nomad_autopilot_healthy{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance) unless sum(clamp_max(nomad_client_uptime{service="nomad"}, 1)) by (instance))
avg by (task, task_group, instance) (avg_over_time(nomad_client_allocs_cpu_total_percent{instance=~"$nodes", task=~"$tasks", task_group=~"$jobs", service="nomad"}[15s]))
sum by (task, task_group, instance) (nomad_client_allocs_memory_usage{instance=~"$nodes", task=~"$tasks", task_group=~"$jobs", service="nomad"})
